title: Disable IDA Downloading Symbols Automatically
content: How can I disable IDA Downloading symbols? It pops up everytime I attach to a remote process. It is really annoying.

comments.text: It's just helping you debugging your program. It downloads the symbols so you can debug the dependencies easier. Why do you want to disable it?
If you really want to disable it, disconnect from the internet / block internet access of IDA, or find some setting to stop the download (I'm on a phone without IDA now)

Because I am debugging an mobile application that is heavily obfuscated and has lots of anti debug/tracing/hooking techniques. Sometime IDA attaches to a remote process and waiting for downloading symbols to long, it makes the application stop. So that why I want to temporary disable this feature.
@raspiduino I have already searched the internet for an option disabling the downloading symbols but got nothing.
